articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets French parliamentary delegation
    Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today met and conversed with the French delegation of members of the parliament of different political parties headed by Christian Martin, member of the national assembly from the Union for French Democracy.
